column1: The Report of Candidates Who Received the Most Votes on Election Night was downloaded on June 13, 2025 at 15:55 ET.

column3: Candidate who received the most votes
column6: Candidate who received the second-most votes
column9: Total number of valid votes cast in the electoral district
column10: Variance between first and second place (number of votes)

column2: West Vancouver--Sunshine Coast--Sea to Sky Country

column1: This data is updated as validated results and judicial recounts become available. The status for each electoral district can be: preliminary results are from election night; validated results are provided by the returning officers during the week following the vote; judicially certified results are published if a recount has been done in the electoral district.
